name: Cloud 9 Financial Consulting
overview:
Financial planning/wealth management company by an entrepreneur, geared towards entrepreneurs.

At Cloud 9 Financial Consulting we serve our clients better than others in our industry. What sets us apart is our desire to get our hands dirty in our clientsâ€™ finances, so they will never think they are alone in the process of becoming wealthy. We donâ€™t just emphasize the relationship aspect of client relationships; we fully integrate them in our consulting practices.

We leverage cloud technology so that we can consult our clients at anytime, any day of the week, in real-time. We handle our sessions through Skype, e-mail, WebEx, phone conversation, Google Wave, and Google Docs. This leveraging of free web applications allow us to lower our overhead, therefore lowering our consulting fees. This business model is how we can give our clients a higher quality, more convenient financial consulting solution, at a lower cost than our competitors.

Cloud 9 Financial Consulting does not have a headquartered office, we focus all of our services and correspondence in cloud technology. This is another attribute that aims to lower overhead, and lower our clients costs. We will fly to meet our client face to face, but only at their request.

We are privately funded and all of our PR (marketing, social media, blogging, etc…) are done in house.
